price: Na hakika wale wasio iamini Akhera wanajitenga na Njia hiyo.
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ
footnotes: Na hakika hao wasio iamini Akhera na yalioko huko ya Pepo au Moto wanaiacha Njia Iliyo Nyooka inayo mhifadhi mpitaji wakaishika njia ya ubabaishi na misukosuko na ufisadi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati ʿani al-ṣirāṭi lanākibūna
